text: Arkadiusz Krystian "Arek" Milik (born 28 February 1994 in Tychy, Poland) is a Polish association football forward who currently plays for the French club Olympique de Marseille (on loan from SSC Napoli) and the Poland national football team. He has also played for AFC Ajax, Rozwój Katowice, Górnik Zabrze, Bayer 04 Leverkusen and FC Augsburg. == Other websites == * Voetbal International profile * Arkadiusz Milik profile on Soccerway * Arkadiusz Milik profile on 91minut == References == Category:1994 births Category:Polish footballers Category:Living people Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players Category:Poland at UEFA Euro 2016 Category:Poland at the 2018 FIFA World Cup Category:Poland at the 2022 FIFA World Cup
title: Arkadiusz Milik
